com.ITE

Class Bitwise

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ITE.Bitwise

  • class Bitwise
extends java.lang.Object
    Bitwise: This class is cantain all Bitwise operators.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Bitwise() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) int AND_Operator(int firstValue, int secondValue)
      AND operator copies a bit to the result if it exists in both operands
      (package private) int Bitwise_Inversion_Operator(int value)
      This Bitwise inversion is use to inverse number by add 1 and then Multiply -1.
      (package private) void calledBitwiseOperators(int option)
      This function is use to call each operators from Bitwise Method.

      (package private) int XOR_Operator(int firstValue, int secondValue)

      • AND_Operator

        int AND_Operator(int firstValue,
                 int secondValue)
        AND operator copies a bit to the result if it exists in both operands
        Parameters:
        firstValue - Integer number.
        secondValue - Integer number.
        Returns:
        value as an integer.

      • OR_Operator

        int OR_Operator(int firstValue,
                int secondValue)
        OR operator copies a bit if it exists in either operand
        Parameters:
        firstValue - Integer number.
        secondValue - Integer number.
        Returns:
        value as an integer.

      • XOR_Operator

        int XOR_Operator(int firstValue,
                 int secondValue)
        XOR operator copies a bit if it is set in only one of the operand but not both
        Parameters:
        firstValue - Integer number.
        secondValue - Integer number.
        Returns:
        value as an integer.

      • Bitwise_Inversion_Operator

        int Bitwise_Inversion_Operator(int value)
        This Bitwise inversion is use to inverse number by add 1 and then Multiply -1.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer number.
        Returns:
        value as an integer.

      • Left_shift

        int Left_shift(int value,
               int number_of_shift)
        Left shift operator. The left operands value is moved left by the number of bits specified by the right operand
        Parameters:
        value - Integer number.
        number_of_shift - shift time.
        Returns:
        value as an integer.

      • Right_shift

        int Right_shift(int value,
                int number_of_shift)
        Right shift operator. The left operands value is moved right by the number of bits specified by the right operand
        Parameters:
        value - Integer number.
        number_of_shift - shift time.
        Returns:
        value as an integer.

      • calledBitwiseOperators

        void calledBitwiseOperators(int option)
        This function is use to call each operators from Bitwise Method. Option:
        1. AND Operator
        2. OR Operator
        3. XOR Operator
        4. Bit-wise inversion
        5. Left Shift Operator
        6. Right Shift Operator
        Parameters:
        option - is an user choice from 1 to 6
